English: Thanks and a bow (my most humble thanks)
A big and warm thank you! (plural)
Thanks to all of you for your help!
Thanks to all our wonderful customers!
A big thanks to the whole team!
Thanks to the whole staff for the good care!
Hungarian: Köszönet az egész személyzetnek a jó ellátásért!

English: Thanks to everyone for the patience!
Big thanks for the fun evening.
A warm thanks for your sympathy.

Hungarian: Köszönöm szépen, hogy felvetted velünk a kapcsolatot!

English: Thanks to all of you for coming.
Thanks for using a face mask.

Hungarian: Köszönöm, hogy felvetted velünk a kapcsolatot!

English: Thanks for doing business with us.
Hungarian: Köszönöm, hogy nálunk intézted az ügyet!

Finnish: Kiitos, että ilmoitit asiasta hyvissä ajoin.
English: Thanks for notifying us in good time.
Hungarian: Köszönöm, hogy időben jelezted az ügyet!

English: Thanks for answering to the survey.
Thanks once again to all of you.
Is this how you (plural) thank me?
They thank the spirit of the forest.
Hungarian: Ők a erdő szellemének hálát adnak.

English: I want to thank my parents.
I want to thank you for the help.
I thanked him for the invitation.
I don't know how to thank you.
Hungarian: Nem tudom, hogyan köszönjem meg neked.
